QuestData.Title: Oh No, Ohn'ahra!
QuestData.Description:
That Primalist is restraining Ohn'ahra, but just barely. She doesn't seem to notice us.
Tigari Khan would say, "Even the slightest breeze can topple a teetering stone." If I can disrupt her spell, even just a little, Ohn'ahra might be able to break free.
Keep the guards distracted. I have an idea.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat enemies as Boku tries to free Ohn'ahra.
QuestData.RewardText: We took quite a tumble. We're lucky to be alive.
